text: Andrea Cordero Lanza di Montezemolo (27 August 1925 – 19 November 2017) was an Italian cardinal of the Roman Catholic Church. He was archpriest of the Basilica of Saint Paul Outside the Walls from 2005 to 2009. He was made a cardinal and made a cardinal-deacon by Pope Benedict XVI on 24 March 2006. He was elevated, according to custom, to the rank of cardinal-priest by Pope Francis on 20 June 2016. He was born in Turin, Italy.. ==References== ==Other websites== *Catholic Hierarchy – Andrea Cardinal Cordero Lanza di Montezemolo *Catholic Pages Category:1925 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Italian cardinals Category:People from Turin
title: Andrea Cordero Lanza di Montezemolo
